name: Fossil Tamer
description:
Description

Fossil Tamer is a rogue-lite deck-building game with creature-collection aspects where you must explore their way out of the mysterious caverns they live in. Creatures known as Fossilmons will help you on this quest with their unique abilities, but only once they have been brought back to life. Will you succeed on your quest?

Dev team note

Remember that this is a development build! There can be bugs, lots of things unexplained, and some weird behaviours, if you see any, all feedback is well received ^^

Feel comfty to use the comments section to suggest upgrades and let us know your opinion.

Att: The Pigstar team <3
